name: Piano Challenges White Tiles 2
description:
Let’s play Piano Challenges 2 White Tiles – one of the new games 2017, on your device NOW! FOR FREE!

Have you ever dreamed of becoming a music maestro? Playing Chopin, Mozart, Beethoven and 2017 HOT songs on a grand piano? Now your dream can come true with Piano Challenges 2 White Tiles - the best piano games series ever!

Tap on the black tiles, don’t tap the white tiles to feel the rhythm and melody.

HOT UPDATES:
• Update NEW SKIN version with NEW AWESOME experience
• The one and only Battle Mode - a new feature in 2017: challenges with more than 5 million players around the world in a “no - mercy” piano online match! The winner takes it all!
• Request any piano songs you love and leave it to us. We will find and bring it to you as fast as we can.
• All new trending songs (updated every week) with a variety of K-pop and US-UK hits in high-quality piano songs.

TOP FEATURES:
• Beautiful piano music which makes it become the best awesome piano games for family & friends. Perform your favorite piano songs and challenges with your friends and other players to show them your piano talent.
• Simple to play, difficult to master – one of the hardest game ever. Catching all the tiles in these high-speed piano games is not easy, especially in our new Battle Mode!
• 200 different piano songs to diverse your music nature.
• Awesome game design and graphic for the piano challenging games. You will feel like you are playing a real luxurious classic piano made with expensive mahogany, whose rhythm is perfect for any piano music lover.
• Smooth gaming experience, easy to play and lightweight to install.
• Songs frequently updated, diverse from classic songs (like Beethoven, Chopin, Mozart, Schubert, Tchaikovsky) to the most popular one.
• Feel the beautiful piano music melodies beyond imagination through every tap with perfect timing tiles.
So, do you have what it takes to get on top of our Leader Board with over 5 million players? This speed tapping piano games is definitely more challenging than you could imagine.

Try out this game now and challenges your own reaction speed and skills!
Piano Challenges 2 White Tiles is waiting for the pianist challengers!
No need to hesitate because we are FREE!
Happy 2017!

Privacy Policy: https://goo.gl/uvQtqM
